data.comment: The match has started at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
Bournemouth take a 0-1 lead thanks to Jefferson Lerma.
In the minute 7, That's a fine assist from Dominic Solanke.
Leo Ostigard (Coventry) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Coventry have been given a penalty...
In the minute 39, Matt Godden scores from the spot to level the match at 1-1.
The first-half has ended.
Jarred Gillett has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Michael Rose is replacing Leo Ostigard for Coventry at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
The home team replace Jordan Shipley with Jamie Allen.
Dan Gosling is on target to give Bournemouth a 1-2 advantage.
In the minute 51, Great play from Dominic Solanke to set up the goal.
Goal! Bournemouth extend their lead to 1-3 through Dan Gosling.
Diego Rico Salguero with an assist there.
In the minute 68, Coventry are down to 10 men after Gustavo Hamer has been shown a red card.
At St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium, Adam Smith has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Steve Cook (Bournemouth) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 73, Dan Gosling (Bournemouth) gets a yellow card.
Jason Tindall is making the team's first substitution at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium with Philip Billing replacing Lewis Cook.
Bournemouth make their second substitution with Jack Simpson replacing Diego Rico Salguero.
In the minute 87, Sam McCallum is on a sub for Ryan Giles for Coventry.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-3.
The away team have replaced Dan Gosling with Nnamdi Ofoborh. This is the third substitution made today by Jason Tindall.
